Here you can manage your content pages.
Here you can view and manage country list. Click on VAT/Tax values to edit in place.

Here you can manage your discounts/coupons.
You don't have any custom fields yet. Please add...
To reorder fields click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.

Here you can manage your news announcements.
Here you can manage your menus.
Drag and drop items to change their position.
Here you can manage your categories.
Here you can send newsletter to all users or newsletter subscribers.
All Email(s) have been sent successfully!
Some of the emails could not be reached!
Here you can manage your site staff members roles and privileges.
Click on Access label to grant/deny access options.
Here you can view and manage privileges for currently selected [ROLE] role.
Here you can update your language phrases. Note: Do not replace variables between [ ]. Click on Value name to edit.
It seems your email templates are missing. Please reinstall.
Here you can design/update existing mailer templates.

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your DDP v.[VER] installation.
Here you can manage your list of available gateways.
You don't have any content f.a.q. yet...
Here you can manage your f.a.q. Once done you can assign all your question and answers under dedicated content page. To reorder items click and drag them around, position it where you want it.

Invalid email and or token detected.

Please select at least one category.

Make sure you are not deleting files that are assigned to an active product!!! Your maximum upload size is [LIMIT]. If you need to upload files larger than your limit ask your hosting company to increase it.

There was an error creating backup.

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/uploads/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Make sure you download your most recent backup, and delete the rest.
Are you sure you want to restore database?
This will delete all [TOTAL] banned user(s).
This empty cart data, used to store temporary user details.
Here you can perform site maintenance, such as deleting inactive and banned users. Be careful what you doing, these actions can not be undone.

This will delete all users (not administrators), who have not logged in to the site within a certain time period. It will not delete users pending verification process. Specify the number of inactive days from above.
Generate site map xml file that you can submit to search engine. File will be stored in DDP root directory named sitemap.xml

Here you can view your latest user statistics, such as lates transactions, number of registered users etc.
Items older than 30 days are automatically deleted forever.
All Records in trash can are now removed.

We use cookies to improve your experience on the website. Some cookies are required to ensure that the site functions correctly, for this reason we may have already set some cookies. Other cookies gather anonymous data about how you are using the website, however these will only be set if you give your consent.
